body:
Comment 1: 
those html files are intended to be served by the godoc program.

for example, you can view go1.1.html here: http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.1.html,
or run godoc locally (run godoc -http=:6060 and visit
http://localhost:6060/doc/go1.1.html)
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
